statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.Name , AA.ChannelFitness , AA.HomePage , AA.StyleOrSku , AA.Email , AA.Phone , AA.MainGoods , AA.Category , AA.Style , AA.Price , AA.Description , AA.TopCategory , AA.GoodsImageUrl
FROM dbo.LMBrandSearch AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.Name LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.ChannelFitness LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.HomePage LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.StyleOrSku LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.Email LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.Phone LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.MainGoods LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.Category LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.Style LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.Price LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.Description LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.TopCategory LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.Name , AA.ChannelFitness , AA.HomePage , AA.StyleOrSku , AA.Email , AA.Phone , AA.MainGoods , AA.Category , AA.Style , AA.Price , AA.Description , AA.TopCategory , AA.GoodsImageUrl
FROM dbo.LMBrandSearch AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.LMBrandSearch ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, Name, ChannelFitness, HomePage, StyleOrSku, Email, Phone, MainGoods, Category, Style, Price, Description, TopCategory, GoodsImageUrl ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #Name#, #ChannelFitness#, #HomePage#, #StyleOrSku#, #Email#, #Phone#, #MainGoods#, #Category#, #Style#, #Price#, #Description#, #TopCategory#, #GoodsImageUrl# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.LMBrandSearch SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, Name = #Name# , ChannelFitness = #ChannelFitness# , HomePage = #HomePage# , StyleOrSku = #StyleOrSku# , Email = #Email# , Phone = #Phone# , MainGoods = #MainGoods# , Category = #Category# , Style = #Style# , Price = #Price# , Description = #Description# , TopCategory = #TopCategory# , GoodsImageUrl = #GoodsImageUrl# WHERE ID = #ID#
